summary: MainPage appears to have been refactored to remove the music UI and associated logic, but the diff also includes edits to the music track configuration file and project metadata files that were not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified the music track configuration file despite the request only requiring removal of MainPage usage/imports of the track list (not changing the track configuration itself).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask to change the contents of the track list, only to eliminate its usage/imports from the MainPage/frontend dependency chain.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository metadata/state files describing features/requests (project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is about removing music playback logic and UI; it does not request changes to project tracking metadata.
The BuildRequest does not request updating documentation/summary artifacts.
